markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Suplex](/Feats.aspx?ID=3397) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 127</row>

**Archetype** [Wrestler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=127)

**Prerequisites**
[Wrestler Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3394)

**Requirements**
You have a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=33).

</column>

---

Flexing your entire body, you heave your opponent over your head and slam them into the ground. Make an [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) melee Strike against the creature you have grabbed or restrained; on a success, the target lands [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31), and on a critical success, the target lands prone and takes an additional 2d6 bludgeoning damage. Regardless of whether the Strike is successful, you immediately release your hold on the target.
name: Suplex
requirement: You have a creature  grabbed  or  restrained .
